title: RNAseq-nf pipeline parameters
description: Nextflow pipeline for RNA sequencing mapping, quality control, reads counting, and unsupervised analysis

input_folder.description: Folder containing BAM or fastq files to be aligned

input_file.description: input tabulation-separated values file with columns SM (sample name), RG (read group), pair1 (first fastq pair file), and pair2 (second fastq pair file)

suffix1.description: Suffix  of 1st fastq file (first element of read files pair)

suffix2.description: Suffix of 2nd fastq file (second element of read files pair)

ref.description: Reference fasta file (with index) for splice junction trimming and base recalibration

ref_folder.description: Folder with genome reference files (with index)

bed.description: Bed file with genes for RESeQC (interval list)

snp_vcf.description: Path to SNP VCF from GATK bundle

indel_vcf.description: Path to indel VCF from GATK bundle

cpu.description: Number of cpu used by bwa mem and sambamba

cpu_GATK.description: Number of cpu used by GATK

cpu_trim.description: Number of cpu used by cutadapt

mem.description: Size of memory used for mapping (in GB)

mem_QC.description: Size of memory used for QC and cutadapt (in GB)

cutadapt.description: Perform adapter and quality reads trimming before alignment

stranded.description: Strand information for counting with htseq [no, yes, reverse]

STAR_mapqUnique.description: STAR default mapping quality for unique mappers

htseq_maxreads.description: Maximum number of reads taken into account by htseq-count

hisat2.description: Use hisat2 instead of STAR for mapping

sjtrim.description: Enable reads trimming at splice junctions
